text: Francine Lalonde (August 24, 1940 - January 17, 2014) was a Canadian politician. She was a Bloc Québécois member of the House of Commons of Canada, representing the districts of La Pointe-de-l'Île from 2004 election to 2011, and Mercier from the 1993 election to 2004. She was also a lecturer, teacher and unionist and campaigner for assisted suicide. She was born in Saint- Hyacinthe, Quebec. Lalonde died from cancer on January 17, 2014 in Quebec. She was 73 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Francine Lalonde at the Parliament of Canada website Category:1940 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Quebec Category:Politicians from Quebec Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada from Quebec Category:Teachers
title: Francine Lalonde
